references.paper_title: Controlling text-to-image diffusion by orthogonal finetuning
references.reason: This paper introduces the orthogonal fine-tuning (OFT) framework, which is the foundation upon which the current work builds and improves.

references.paper_title: Monarch: Expressive structured matrices for efficient and accurate training
references.reason: This paper introduces Monarch matrices, a class of structured matrices that are generalized and improved upon in the current work.

references.paper_title: Parameter-efficient orthogonal finetuning via butterfly factorization
references.reason: This paper introduces the Butterfly Orthogonal Fine-Tuning (BOFT) method, which is compared against and improved upon by the proposed method.

references.paper_title: High-resolution image synthesis with latent diffusion models
references.reason: This paper introduces Stable Diffusion, a key model used in the empirical validation of the proposed method.
This paper introduces skew orthogonal convolutions, which are adapted and improved upon in the current work for greater efficiency
